entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .Net Maui Hybrid Blazor app publish issue #17018

Closed

  • SafeArea gets applied to any child controls even if you've disabled the safe area for the page #12417
    Backlog
  • SelectedItem for Picker show default data when ItemSource is set from vm for windows #16827
  • DisplayAlert not working on MacCatalyst and UWP #11766
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI CollectionView scrolling doesn't work #12643
    .NET 8 + Servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17017
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [core] factory methods for registering services, part 2 #17004
    area/perf 🏎️, area/hosting 🧩

Updated

  • Ignore failures from newly added UITests temporarily #17003
  • [macOS] Implement IsEnabled property in MenuFlyoutItems #14920
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-contextmenu, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Changes in Border clipping part #15856
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-border, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix Android text alignment in migrated projects #16986
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • Fix for Spinner not disappearing in RefreshView #16997
    area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview, i/regression
